title.narrative: Women victims of violence have increased access to quality essential services

description.narrative: All women and girls live a life free from all forms of violence
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

title.narrative: National legislation (the Comprehensive Law 348 to fight violence against women) and related policies implemented with UNW's technical assistance, advocacy and partnership building (including inter-agency coordination).
